channel.title: Angular on Dave's Hacks
channel.description: Recent content in Angular on Dave's Hacks

item.title: A Web Based Remote for the i-Cybie
item.description: When I was young there was one robot that I always wanted, that was a Sony Aibo, unfortunately the closest I ever got was playing with an ERS-7 at an after school club. I still don’t have a Sony Aibo and even though I keep looking at the ERS-1000 I would have to do some amazing mental gymnastics to be able to justify getting one. Soon after the Aibo was released Silverlit developed the i-Cybie, a cheaper and less sophisticated robot dog.
